pages.text: $(item)Shards/$ allow you to store $(thing)elements/$ in item form, where they can be readily inserted into $(item)Conduits/$. To do so, simply use a $(item)Shard/$ on a $(item)Conduit/$.
To make $(item)Shards/$, you'll need 4 $(item)Fragments/$, which can be made using $(thing)reaction crafting/$ with the 3 ingredients that you would typically put into a $(item)Condenser/$.
